author: Reuters Editorial
title: Israel says Iran's Soleimani commanded attack on its Golan bases
text:
May 10, 2018 / 3:53 AM / Updated 10 hours ago Israel says Iran's Soleimani commanded attack on its Golan bases Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
JERUSALEM (Reuters) - Israel accused the general in charge of the Iranian Revolutionary Guards Corps’ external operations branch of orchestrating a rocket attack on Thursday against Israeli army bases on the Golan Heights from within Syria. An Israeli soldier stands on a tank as another jumps off it near the Israeli side of the border with Syria in the Israeli-occupied Golan Heights, Israel May 9, 2018. REUTERS/Amir Cohen
“It was ordered and commanded by Qassem Soleimani and it has not achieved its purpose,” Israeli military spokesman Lieutenant-General Jonathan Conricus told reporters. Writing by Dan Williams; Editing by Darren Schuettler
